sub_title: Azure Platform Engineer and Tech lead at ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
summary:
I'm an agile teamplayer that likes to dream big. The "What If" question is one of my favorite.
Everything is possible which doesn't mean you should want everything.

My passion is to weigh carefully the effort against the benefits, to decide to do something or not. I think I have interest in a broad variety of subjects but my specialty at the moment is Automation with Azure devops

education.field_of_study: English, Dutch, French, Biology, Physics, Mathematics, Chemics

projects.title: Login Online Desktop
projects.description: De Login Online Desktop is een 'business enabled' Desktop as a Service (DaaS) cloud oplossing die overal, altijd en op elk apparaat veilige toegang tot bedrijfsapplicaties en data biedt. De gemanagede, business enabled cloud desktops zijn gebouwd door een combinatie van cloud desktops van DaaS-providers met de business enablement producten van Login Consultants. Organisaties krijgen niet alleen de desktop, maar ook de functionaliteit die hen in staat stelt om deze desktop binnen een bedrijfsomgeving te gebruiken. De Login Online Desktop is onderdeel van het domein van de organisatie met desktop- en applicatiemanagement inclusief bedrijfsspecifieke applicaties, file servers, enterprise app store, automatisering van de oplevering van applicaties en managementinfrastructuur. Het is een cloud-gebaseerde desktop die eindgebruikers toegang geeft tot documenten, applicaties en middelen op een apparaat van hun eigen keuze, inclusief laptops, iPads of Android tablets.

projects.title: Migration specialist @ Erasmusbrug
projects.description:
The Erasmusbrug IT department of Careyn is on the verge of a migration of the first company domains. My job is to write Powershell scripts that enables the administrators to create AD groups, File structures and apply the security according to the resource disclosure design. The user properties needs to be set and function profiles needs to be created and shape the Function model in the AD. 

All the scripts are to be used in the daily administration process, which demands a high quality standard with a proper error handling. Which pushes my Powershell and script knowledge to the limit, superb!!

The time pressure is huge which makes this a very interesting project.

contributors.headline: Azure Platform Engineer and Tech lead at ABN AMRO Bank N.V.

projects.title: Hogeschool van Amsterdam - Lead developer IT flex client
projects.description:
My responsibility is to strategically consult and build the IT flex workspace. This includes a Windows 7 desktop/laptop environment deployed and managed by SCCM. I configured the workspace to match the user experience and the demands.

The device is an endpoint device to provide access to the XenApp/XenDesktop/App-V and SCCM applications. All environments are managed by SCCM except the XenApp environment which is managed by Solution4.

The product portfolio gives space to implement the BYOC concept for students and employees. This is done by a Netscaler solution but this is not my direct responsibility.

This way we accomplished to create an environment that fully supports any place, any device, anywhere. One of the components to do this is the "platform independent" profile solution Flex Profiles of Immidio.

projects.title: Active Directory and migration specialist @ Erasmusbrug ICT
projects.description:
For the customer Erasmusbrug I worked in a projectteam of around 5 people and we did a NT4/Exchange5.5 decentralised migration to a centralised environment with Win2003/Exch2003 with a 3 node cluster of which an active/active exchange-cluster. Besides this we also implemented a Server Based Computer farm to host proximately 1000 users.
During this project I wrote a lot of scripts to make the actual migration as smooth as possible. I build the cluster and did a lot of other things to complete the migration and not to forget I wrote the concept of the migration plan. And as everybody, nobody can do this alone, we did this as a team and we did a very good job.

contributors.headline: Azure Platform Engineer and Tech lead at ABN AMRO Bank N.V.

profile_positions.description:
Enabling other devops teams by offering self service tools in Azure to control their platform infrastructure. 
Redesigning process flows to keep them scalable and lightweight so they are durable for the future.
profile_positions.title: Azure Devops Cloud engineer (Platform Engineer)

profile_positions.description:
I refocused on the configuration, implementation and consequences of the Azure engineering aspect of the job. 
After a roller-coaster year trying to advertise, protect, create the vision for the cloud and helping/managing the team I realized I didn't meet my own quality standards on both sides on the job.

Now I put my focus on:
* domain and solution architectural design decisions;
* reviewing proposed solutions within the team;
* creating policies, templates, scripts, pipelines etc myself again
* chalange the Product Owner of our team
* chalange teammembers
I'm very happy I refocused on the above, it gives me a lot more energy. 
But sometimes I still miss the "What if.... (fantasy)" discussions. So yess I still have aspirations to think about a vision for ... almost anything. But now I don't let it influence the quality of my work anymore.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I sanitize and prioritize the backlog.
Besides that I keep track of the progress of the team and together with the Scrummaster I try to solve impedements.

I create a vision for the cloud environment together with my team and the enterprise architects and I advertise that vision to the rest of the organisation.
profile_positions.title: Teamlead and product owner for the Azure Cloud Foundation team

profile_positions.description: Building hybrid workplace environments for embracing Bring Your Own Devices.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Architect EUC

profile_positions.description:
This month I had a couple of sales support job in translating a request for a bid into a fixed price offer.

Although it is a new kind of skill to me. This is getting more and more fun to do. The structured way of working and the combination of keeping the overview and the detailed numbers. Has made me a better IT consultant as wel.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant as Sales support

profile_positions.description: Implementing a AD upgrade and a PoC Terminal server Windows 2008 R2 with TS WebAccess and TS Gateway.
profile_positions.title: Consultant @ ANT Trust

profile_positions.description:
This customer is about to migrate to their new SBC environment with App-V, SCCM, XenApp 6.5, Login Automation Machine for Hosted Desktops, Immidio Flex Profiles. I'm asked to assist the internal administrators to solve issues during that migration. 

I was able to help streamlining the test process of the packages and solve the application issues as well as deployment testing.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Martinair is developping a new hybrid workplace in combination with BYOD. The IT incorporation in the KLM and the latest technical equipement makes this a personal challenge.

My role in the project started as developping the new desktop. The more the project evolved my role evolved as wel. Now I'm keeping the overview of the project and in that role I'm the teamlead of the building team.

The indepth troubleshooting of SCCM 2012, App-V, Windows 7, SCVMM, Hyper-v server 2008 R2 SP1, XenApp 6.5 and XenDesktop and the overview makes this a very complex but most challenging project.

The migration and integration of the daughter company MVVL (Martinair Flight Academy) was a part of the project. At the end I was able to successfully tranfer the environment to the new administration party. 

Looking back at the project, it was a lot of work in a pretty short periode of time and I'm proud the result. Some things can always be better but it is at least the quality Martinair asked and needs to be in business.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description: I built a proof of the the new flexible workspace concept. This was including VDI (XenDesktop) / XenApp and provisioning server.

profile_positions.title: KPN Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Troubleshooting a profile problem in a SBC environment with Citrix Presentation Server 4.5 and RES PowerFuse 2008.
I created a custom maintenance script to clean the machines after reboot. 
Also I helped finishing the migration of a couple of applications from the old farm to the new one.
My main accomplishment is to make the customer realise that a maintenance window and a maintenancescript is necessary in a SBC environment. Til now the customer didn't want that.
profile_positions.title: SBC Consultant
